embed1.title: Help Menu
embed1.description:
[name] is a easy-to-use Fortnite bot.

**Links**
[Privacy Policy]([website]/privacy-policy)
[Terms of Service]([website]/tos)
[Support Server]([supportServer])
[Invite Link]([invite])

embed1.description: You have purchased a total of [bought] V-Bucks since [date].

embed1.title: ðŸ“² Login to your Epic Games Account
embed1.description:
**:warning: We recommend logging into accounts that only have email access!**
1. Visit the link above and find the 'authorizationCode' key.
2. Copy the entire value next to the key. The code will be valid for 30 seconds, refresh the page to get a new code.
3. Click the 'Submit' button below and paste the code in the provided field. If the code is 'null', log into your Epic Games account at https://epicgames.com/login and try again.

**Need to switch accounts?**
[Click Here]([loginurl])

changenickname.error: An unknown error occurred while changing the nickname.
changenickname.okay: Your friend's new nickname has been set as [name].

buytiers.notenough: You need [requiredVB] more to purchase [amount] tiers. You currently have: [currentVB]
buytiers.unknown: An unknown error occurred during the purchase.

general.didntconnectdb: The command couldn't be executed because the bot couldn't connect to the database. Please try again later and join our [support server]([support]) for more information.
general.blacklist: You can't use the bot. You were blacklisted with reason: [reason].
general.supserveronly: You can only use this command in [our support server]([support]).
general.loginreq: Please login via [command] command to use this command.
general.dataerror: We had to log you out of your account because your data was not properly processed in the database. Please log in again, and if the issue persists, join our [support server]([support]) for assistance.
general.servererror: This command could not be executed due to an error. The common reason for this error is that the Fortnite servers are offline.
general.hadtologout:
Your session has been terminated! It could be due to one of the following reasons:
â€¢ Session timeout.
â€¢ Epic Games or yourself revoked all authorizations.

You have been automatically logged out of your account. You can log in again
general.missingperms: This command couldn't be executed because of missing permissions on your account.
general.error: An unexpected error occurred while executing this command, and the error has been reported to the developers. Please join our [support server]([support]) for assistance.
general.acceptedtryagain: You have accepted the rules. Click the button again to continue.
general.loginbruh: Please log in by clicking the 'Connect Your Account' button or using the [command] command before claiming your role.
general.norank: You have connected your account, but you don't have any rank yet. Complete a match now to rank up! Once you're done, you can claim your role with the 'Refresh Rank' button.
general.rank: You have connected your account and obtained the [role] role because you are currently at rank [currentRank]! Keep ranking up and update your role on the server with the 'Refresh Rank' button.
general.alreadyloggedin: You have already logged in with this account.
general.help: If you need help, join our [support server]([support]).

deviceidcreated.title: Device Auth Created
deviceidcreated.footer: To log out and delete your account information from the bot, use the /logout command.

general.dontuseanother: Please log in to the bot using only the link provided by the bot.
general.expiredAuthCode: An error occurred while logging in. The authorization code may have expired. Please try again.
general.expiredExchange: An error occurred while logging in. The Exchange Code may have expired. Please try again.
general.noresults: No results found! Try changing the search and result languages.

errorTitles: :warning: Not the Llama You're Looking For!

rules.title: Please Read Before Logging in:
rules.description:
Please Read Before Logging In:

1. We do not share or display your user data to anyone; we take your account security very seriously!
2. Please use this bot only if you fully accept the potential risks that may come with it.
3. We do not take responsibility for any actions taken against your account, including but not limited to restrictions, closures, or bans. These situations may arise from the usage or misuse of commands.

**If you agree to these terms, click the 'I Accept' button below!**

[Privacy Policy]([website]/privacy-policy) - [Terms of Service]([website]/tos)
